body_html:
I'm guessing it's related to the --depth option you're cloning with, which may have issues with remote repositories.

I typically clone with the following command:
git clone --recursive https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/
body_text:
I'm guessing it's related to the --depth option you're cloning with, which may have issues with remote repositories.
I typically clone with the following command:
git clone --recursive https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/
body:
I'm guessing it's related to the `--depth` option you're cloning with, which may have [issues](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/23708231/git-shallow-clone-clone-depth-misses-remote-branches) with remote repositories.

I typically clone with the following command:
`git clone --recursive https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/`
